hotels.name: Hotel Hafen Hamburg
hotels.description: Hotel Hafen Hamburg is a maritime hotel located directly above the famous St. Pauli "Landungsbr√ºcken". This "Pearl in the Port" stands for tradition, maritime flair and elegance - as well as for unforgettable views of the River Elbe. Our 380 sumptuous rooms, offering all the conveniences you would expect in a first-class hotel. The Port of Hamburg is also ideally suited for meetings, conferences and celebrations of all kinds: all our rooms are equipped with the latest technology and offer magnificent views of the River Elbe and port Bar's legendary cocktails and our intimate maritime "Bierstube" bar round off your visit to Hamburg perfectly.

hotels.name: Sonesta Cairo Hotel Tower & Casino
hotels.description: Sonesta Cairo & Casino features a full-service spa and wellness centre, a casino and five on-site restaurants. The luxury hotel is just 10 minutes from Cairo International Airport in the Heliopolis business district. There are 409 rooms and suites at this hotel, each of which boasts satellite TV, a mini bar, individual climate control and writing desks. Rooms are equipped with electronic door locks for added security. Guests of Sonesta Cairo Hotel Tower & Casino enjoy access to an outdoor swimming pool with a poolside bar, a sauna and a fully-equipped gym. Additional features include complimentary airport shuttle services, 24-hour reception, babysitting services and complimentary Wi-Fi. The hotel is home to five restaurants, serving a variety of international cuisine, three lounge bars, a nightclub and a French cafe. From the hotel it is less than two kilometres to Cairo Conference Centre, and 20 kilometres to the pyramids.
